name: One-Pot Lentil Curry
description: A comforting and flavourful lentil curry made entirely in one pot. Perfect for meal prepping.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
description: Fresh and light quinoa salad packed with olives, tomatoes, and cucumber.

name: Black Bean Burgers
description: Hearty homemade black bean burgers that hold their shape and are full of protein.

name: Spicy Peanut Noodles
description: Quick, creamy, and spicy peanut sauce tossed with whole wheat noodles and crisp vegetables.

name: Vegan Shepherd's Pie
description: Classic comfort food with a savoury lentil and mushroom base topped with fluffy mashed potatoes.

name: Tofu Scramble
description: A high-protein, quick breakfast substitute for scrambled eggs.

name: Roasted Vegetable Tacos
description: Colourful roasted vegetables served in corn tortillas with a creamy avocado sauce.

name: Creamy Tomato Pasta
description: A simple, rich tomato sauce brightened with fresh basil and a touch of cream.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Decadent and creamy mushroom risotto, perfect for a special dinner.

name: Chickpea and Spinach Stew
description: A hearty, spiced stew with chickpeas, spinach, and smoked paprika.

name: Lemon Garlic Asparagus
description: A quick, healthy side dish with a bright, zesty flavor.

name: Sweet Potato Chili
description: A slightly sweet and smoky chili with sweet potatoes and kidney beans.

name: Overnight Oats
description: The perfect, customizable breakfast for busy mornings. No cooking required!

name: Vegan Brownies
description: Fudgy and rich brownies, completely dairy and egg-free.

name: Roasted Red Pepper Soup
description: A creamy, dairy-free soup with a smoky depth from roasted peppers.

name: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Quick weeknight stir fry with seasonal vegetables and a savory sauce.
